items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has come to us for help.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been treated fairly.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been here very long.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been getting better.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been gaining weight.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been busy this week.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been asked to leave.
Tom could probably take Mary home in his car.
Tom could probably stop Mary from doing that.
Tom could get Mary to show us how to do that.
Tom can get to work by public transportation.
Tom came into my room and gave me a sandwich.
Tom came in, grabbed his briefcase, and left.
Tom called Mary several times this afternoon.
Tom called Mary and asked her to pick him up.
Tom brought a box full toys to the orphanage.
Tom bought a three-room house on Park Street.
Tom believes in giving people second chances.
Tom begged his parents to take him to Boston.
Tom begged Mary not to tell John what he did.
